lyrics_abstract:
Ladies and gentlemen (ladies and gentlemen, ooowee)
This is a Jazze Phizzle Productshizzle (Jazze Phizzle)
Missy (Missy)
The princess is here (Ooowee) (She's here)
Ciara! (This beat is)

Automatic, supersonic, hypnotic, funky fresh
Work my body, so melodic, this beat flows right through my chest
Everybody, ma and papi, came to party, grab some[...]
